name: The Shiralee Hostel
description:
The hostel is within 10 mins walk of Central train station, Perth City Centre and 5 mins walk of supermarkets, Northbridge precinct.

Please Check emails if getting in late!! (Junk) Mail before calling the 24-hour phone number 

if you hide your email address and we cannot send the door codes which means you cannot get in you will still be charged 

Please NOTE if you book a female dorm and turn up and not a female you won't be able to stay in that room, and you still will be charged unless we can sell the bed which will incur costs 

please read info on twin rooms and also if you book more than one person as sometimes, we can't get you into the same room 

The Shiralee accommodates all travelers from around the world offering free Wi-Fi to all guests, free breakfast (consisting of toast, bread, butter, peanut butter, marmalade and jams) for all guests, TV with Netflix, provides laundry facilities, free locker usage (provide your own lock) and free towel use. If you are feeling peckish or thirsty there are vending machines with drinks and snacks available. We have a very large outdoor area where guests are allowed to drink, listen to music and enjoy meeting other travelers. plus, we now have an ice-cold water dispenser to use free of charge. 

The reception is open from 7.30 am till 12 pm then from 6pm till 10.30 pm, 7 days a week. You can check in from 11am and your room will be ready around 12pm. Check in outside the reception hours would be self-check-in and all the info will be sent to you after the booking.
Nearly all our rooms have air-conditioning and room sizes vary from private rooms and 4-share or 6-share and 8- share mixed or female-only. Prices vary accordingly to accommodate everybody.
Guest come to The Shiralee intending to stay for a few days but end up staying for weeks or even months! You will meet great people here and make friends for life.



Free food nights and we also cater for vegetarians on these nights.


As this hostel is centrally located, guests can take a 9-minute drive to Kings Park for a picnic or Cottesloe Beach, a 20-minute drive away for a beautiful swim in the ocean. To reach us from the airport: you can take bus 380 to the bus station in the city. From there, take bus 60, which will drop you off in front of the hostel. The price is around $8. Be aware that busses only take small change. The bus starts around 5am and ends around midnight. (For the exact timetable see the Trans Perth website). If you want to get a taxi or an Uber its around $35.

Aircon is set a fixed temperature in all the rooms as we can't change it for one person who wants it hot/cold. When its summer the rooms get warm. We keep the aircon on for everyone. We have more blanket's if you don't like it so cold. 

Please Note: We are an international youth hostel. We can only accept guests with a valid international passport or driving license (NO locals) and do not accept guests over the age of 35 in dorm rooms. Unfortunately, we have no facilities for guests under the age of 18 years. 
We don't charge a deposit for linen or crockery and there is no surcharge for card payment.

Please also be aware that multiple guests booking on the one booking may not be staying in the same room.
Please note the setup of twin rooms do change from time to time from two single beds to a double on the bottom and a single on top which makes a bunk bed.

See you soon at The Shiralee Hostel in Perth, Western Australia!

With keys we don't give keys out for dorms and if you would like one its $30 Deposit. Private rooms all have keys

houseRules.notes:
The reception is open from 7.30 am till 12 then from 6pm till 10:30 pm7  days a week. Check in outside the reception hours would be self-check-in and all the info will be sent to you one day before your Arrival

No Locals (Must have a passport)

If you do not cancel and are a no show then you will be charged the first nights accommodation for each guest unless its a non refundable booking then you will be charged the whole amount 

For guests wishing to extend their stay here with us, a full non refundable payment must be paid to secure your bed for the extended period.

We do not refund after you have checked in and paid.
PLEASE NOTE THIS IS NOT A PARTY HOSTEL
You may not bring non guests onto the premises at any time during your stay.

If you book a non refundable booking and your credit card is declined we put the beds back on line and the booking will be cancelled

We only accept international guests at our Hostel and a international passport will need to be provided upon check in.
We do not accept government welfare recipients.
This is not a worker's hostel. 

Thank you, The Shiralee Hostel

Please Note

If management or police have to come down and deal with anyone, we will change a call out fee of $200.
